entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • The JIT compiler encountered invalid IL code or an internal limitation. #105518
    9.0.0
  • .NET 9 Preview 7 - LLVM-related build failure #105516
  • Arm64/Sve: Validation for movprfx in emitter #105514
    9.0.0
  • Arm64/Sve: Ld/St info should be added for SVE instructions #105512
    9.0.0
  • [mono][maccatalyst] MacCatalyst template app crashes in AOT+interp mode in .NET 8 #105510
    8.0.x
  • Getting Enum fields/attributes in trimmed and AOT'd applications #105506
    9.0.0
  • mono_thread_platform_create_thread crashing with pthread_attr_setstacksize invalid argument error #105490
    9.0.0
  • Building tests fails on a system without support for RSA+SHA1 #105486
  • JIT SVE: Assertion failed '!IsUnusedValue()' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #105484
    9.0.0
  • AV in runtime when catching exception thrown in other ALC with new EH on win-arm64 #105483
  • JIT: Missing argument validation for `ExtractVector64` when optimizing #105479
    9.0.0
  • JIT: SVE Assertion failed 'GetEmitter()->emitInsIsStore(ins)' during 'Generate code' #105478
    9.0.0
  • [android] MAUI app with localized resources build on Windows crashes with non-default culture #105476
    9.0.0
  • JIT: SVE Assertion failed 'targetReg != embMaskOp2Reg' during 'Generate code' #105474
    9.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'compCyclesAtEnd >= m_compCyclesAtEndOfInlining fails intermittently on freebsd-x64 Debug build #105472
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Potential bad codegen with `AlignRight` #105468
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'isContainable || supportsRegOptional' during 'Generate code' #105467
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Potential bad codegen for bit extractions #105466
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Bad codegen with `Vector256` shift by `Vector128` #105465
    9.0.0
  • App is experiencing a freeze, probably due to GC suspending threads #105463
  • How to use Source Generator P/Invoke with Byte[] in struct properly? #105462
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 5 Regressions in System.Buffers.Tests.SearchValuesCharTests on 7/22/2024 3:17:40 PM #105488
  • [NETSDKE2E]Native symbols cannot be resolved with PerfView tool. #105457
  • Add a required check for the NO-MERGE label #105452
  • RateLimiter seems to hang with 1024 Permit Limit #105446
  • Test failure: ArgumentNullException in CompileMethodCleanup #105444
  • Test failure: tracing/eventcounter/runtimecounters/runtimecounters.cmd #105443
  • Test failure: NullReferenceException in Internal.JitInterface.CorInfoImpl._beginInlining #105441

Closed

  • BEGIN_ILLINK_FEATURE_SWITCH mechanism for `corelib.h` does not work with nested classes #71847
    9.0.0
  • CrossGen2 failure `JIT/Methodical/Methodical_r2/superlong_il_r.dll.rsp`: Unhandled exception #105492
  • CrossGen2 failure `JIT/Regression/Regression_3/GitHub_21546.dll.rsp`: Unhandled exception #105493
  • CrossGen2 failure `JIT/CodeGenBringUpTests/JIT.CodeGenBringUpTests/AsgSub1_d.dll`: Unhandled exception #105491
  • CrossGen2 failure `JIT/Methodical/Methodical_d2/deep_gc_d.dll.rsp`: Unhandled exception #105497
  • Test failure `TestRuntimeEventCounter`: InvalidOperationException #105503
  • CrossGen2 failure `Loader/classloader/TypeGeneratorTests/TypeGeneratorTests100-199/Generated130.dll.rsp`: Unhandled exception #105494
  • CrossGen2 failure `JIT/Methodical/Methodical_others/b39946.dll.rsp`: NullReferenceException #105498
  • CrossGen2 failure `JIT/opt/JIT.opt/NonVoidThrowHelper.dll.rsp`: Unhandled exception #105495
  • CrossGen2 failure `JIT/Performance/JIT.performance/Burgers.dll.rsp`: NullReferenceException #105499
  • CrossGen2 failure `JIT/Regression/Regression_1/b091942.dll.rsp`: NullReferenceException #105500
  • CrossGen2 failure `JIT/jit64/jit64_5/structfp1_2.dll.rsp`: NullReferenceException #105501
  • DeepEquals_TooDeepJsonDocument_ThrowsInsufficientExecutionStackException test failure #105425
    9.0.0
  • DeepEquals_TooDeepJsonDocument_ThrowsInsufficientExecutionStackException doesn't throw #105440
    9.0.0
  • baseservices/threading/commitstackonlyasneeded/DefaultStackCommit/DefaultStackCommit.cmd timed out #104058
    9.0.0
  • Exception when using LibGit2Sharp with .NET 9 preview 6 #104872
    9.0.0
  • The Japanese string returned by the DateTime.ToLongDateString and DateOnly.ToLongDateString methods is incorrect. #105381
    Future
  • MSBuild crashing intermittently during build with P6 #105505
  • [NativeAOT] Exact devirtualization produces a redundant type test with empty fallback #105199
    9.0.0
  • Respecting EnumMemberAttribute in AOT'd applications #97737
    9.0.0
  • Some hwintrinsic related antigen failures #105255
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 7 Regressions on 3/18/2024 9:28:21 PM #100090
    9.0.0
  • [nativeaot][maccat] Add Native AOT runtime tests coverage on maccatalyst platforms #89437
    9.0.0
  • Tests are spamming ITestOutputHelper logs for passing tests #103445
    9.0.0
  • [mono][swift] App crashes in AOT + interpreter setup as it cannot find `System.Runtime.InteropServices.Swift` types #105245
    9.0.0
  • `Guid(ReadOnlySpan<Byte>)` throws if source span is not precisely sized #105473
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'codeSize <= MAX_PROLOG_SIZE_BYTES' during 'Emit code' #94660
    9.0.0
  • [libraries-jitstress] `System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests.SingleGenericTensorPrimitives.SpanScalarDestination_SpecialValues` fails in CI on win-x86 #104316
    9.0.0
  • Bugs in `Console` members `KeyAvailable` and `ReadKey()` on Windows platform #102425
    9.0.0
  • Ctor_Dispose_HandleClosedIfOwnsHandle failed in CI #105379
    9.0.0
  • string.Format() CompositeFormat overloads. Why no overload without IFormatProvider? #105459
  • [browser] Trigger relink on `EmccMaximumHeapSize` change #104790
    9.0.0
  • 'openssl/engine.h' not found on RHEL10 #104775
    Future
  • Test failure: System.Tests.GCTests.KeepAlive_Null #104218
    9.0.0
  • Add better ZipFile extraction APIs #1552
  • Long individual GC pauses: how to investigate? #102657
  • Test failure: #105442
  • [Analyzer] Use the async counterpart when available #104208
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Support field access on variables of type Enum #105524
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • zlib-ng patch for WD suppresion fixes #105523
    area-Infrastructure
  • Skip reloc handling for IMAGE_REL_BASED_DIR64 if already handled #105522
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [GC] Avoid OOM in large-allocation-only workloads #105521
    area-GC-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Use ConcurrentDictionary in runtimecounters test #105520
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Delete outdated comments #105519
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • GC cleanup from #94175 #105517
    NO-MERGE, area-GC-coreclr
  • Revert "Optimize BOX+UNBOX for "T? -> T" and "T -> T?" (#104931)" #105515
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix throwing exception when calling RunClassConstructor on a generic type with a static constructor #105513
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Ensure we don't reuse temps when calling fgMorphArgs on LIR nodes #105508
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fixed a broken build with STRESS_DYNAMIC_HEAP_COUNT enabled #105507
    area-GC-coreclr
  • chore: fix some comments #105504
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Update Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.Specification.Tests.c… #105502
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • New feature switches that are not going to be publicly documented #105496
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Enable CertificateCallbackThrowPropagates on Alpine #105489
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Ensure constant evaluation of shifts on xarch broadcast the operand to the correct size #105487
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable generator tests on big-endian #105485
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 9.0.0
  • Fix missing frame on inner exception stack trace in release build #105482
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Pass content lenght into limited streams as Int64 #105481
    area-System.Net
  • Fix ShuffleThunk cache heap #105480
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono][interp] Attempt to interpret m2n wrapper if it is not found in aot image #105477
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.9
  • [browser] Marshalling of resolved Tasks/promises is not resolved in JS/C# #105464
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [browser] Fix computing destination sub path and publish extension target path #105458
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add a missing = in BigInteger.cs #105456
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Disable ImportWithPasswordOrFileName_IterationCountLimitExceeded on 32-bit CPUs #105455
    area-System.Security
  • [mono] Disable JIT/Methodical/Methodical_[r,d][o,1] on x64 AOT and fullAOT #105453
    arch-x64, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Reapply "Remove zlib from requirements script and instruction files"" #105450
    NO-MERGE, area-System.IO.Compression, blocked

Merged

  • zlib-ng: avoid suppressing WD4242 and WD4244 #105433
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/8.0-staging] [GC] Fix freelist crash - don't modify during check-only operation #104992
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 8.0.9
  • Try to re-enable DeepEquals_TooDeepJsonDocument_ThrowsInsufficientExecutionStackException test on mono #105509
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Fix up Fuzzlyn CI scripts for new hardware intrinsics support #105470
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [PERF] Use correct python executable inside python venv on Windows #105451
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fixed for assertion failure due to not checking if we are processing Ephemeral Samples in calculate_new_heap_count #105164
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add support for nested types in the `corelib.h` parser for rooting descriptors #105432
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix double printing in StressLog and simplify stresslog macros #105420
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Update docs for ByRefLike with generics for work in .NET 10 #103318
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Update the ResourceData API #105416
    area-HostModel, 9.0.0
  • [release/6.0-staging] Build Mono build tasks packs only when targeting mobile #105461
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, 6.0.33
  • [release/8.0-staging] Build Mono build tasks packs only when targeting mobile #105460
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, 8.0.9
  • Make TooDeepJsonDocument test more consistent across platforms #105445
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Update mono to support shuffle for constant inputs #105299
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #104940
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework, area-codeflow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #104934
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Support field access on GetType() of T constrained to be Enum #105351
    linkable-framework, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Set xunit env var to not print output for passing tests #105392
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Some more automated C# modernization in corelib #105151
    area-Meta, 9.0.0
  • Resolving an antigen failure #105260
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable NativeAOT runtime tests on MacCatalyst #102882
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-maccatalyst, 9.0.0
  • Add swiftcall signature check for `mono_class_try_get_swift_error_class` #105408
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Fix ECMA 355 Partition download links #105454
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Use correct `ExceptionArgument` value in `System.IO.Pipelines` #105418
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, community-contribution
  • JIT: Introduce VNWalkPhis and use in VNNeverNegative as an example #105197
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use `BinaryPrimitives` more in the ILCompiler #105404
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Pull the python dependency from the EmsdkVersion where possible #105437
    area-Build-mono
  • Delete erroneous Socket test #105448
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • [browser] Trigger relink on `EmccMaximumHeapSize` change #105027
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • Fix platform analyzer attribute order for MacCatalyst #105409
    area-System.Security
  • Remove zlib from requirements script and instruction files #105419
    NO-MERGE, blocked, area-Infrastructure
  • Migrate to zlib-ng, part 3: Remove zlib and zlib-intel source code and license mentions (second attempt) #105371
    area-Infrastructure
  • Update emsdk dependency to match what emsdk produces #105434
    Servicing-approved, area-Build-mono
  • Ensure that WaitForPendingFinalizers has seen the expected Full GC count #105289
    area-VM-coreclr, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Revert "Remove zlib from requirements script and instruction files" #105449
    needs-area-label

Updated

  • Clean up some usages of LowLevelList<T> #105407
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add alternate system color experimental feature #105525
    area-System.Drawing, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Generate type generic composition information as constructed #105133
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [EventSource] Block EventCommandExecuted callback during initialization #105341
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Error out when the size of a field is too big #104393
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Add ZLib, Brotli compression options #105430
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2502714 #105050
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Fix MaxWorkingSet_GetNotStarted_ThrowsInvalidOperationException #105424
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-freebsd, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution
  • Convert.FromHexString exception with too large buffer #105426
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Arm64/Sve: Add FFR register liveness tracking #105348
    arm-sve, 9.0.0
  • SunOS process and thread support #105403
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-SunOS, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add runtime config parameter to force ijwhost to load assemblies in an isolated context #105436
    Servicing-approved, area-Host, 8.0.9
  • Extend preinitialization arithmetic and string manipulation #105429
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Convert `GetNumVirtuals*` from `FCall` to `QCall` #105365
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Disable W^X in Rosetta emulated x64 containers on macOS #105117
    Servicing-approved, area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.9
  • ILVerify: Added option `--suppress-type-verification` #105375
    area-ILVerification
  • [Mono] Intrinsify Unsafe API's #105150
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • add new JsonIgnoreAttribute WhenWriting/WhenReading #104562
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Remove short branches #105386
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Cleanup some code under FEATURE_STUBS_AS_IL #104731
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Clarify XML comments for Utf8Parser.TryParse to reflect case insensitivity #103861
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Fix paltest_pal_sxs_test1 on illumos #105207
    area-PAL-coreclr, os-SunOS, community-contribution
  • [HTTP] Unobserved exceptions report in stress #105336
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [RISC-V][LoongArch64] New passing info for floating-point structs #103945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • Use filesystem name mapping on FreeBSD #105417
    area-System.IO, os-freebsd, community-contribution
  • Switch DirectoryControl to use AsnWriter, AsnDecoder #101512
    area-System.DirectoryServices, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Fix a potential out-of-bound read in RuntimeInvokeHostAssemblyResolver #104536
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • NativeAOT the XUnitLogChecker #103795
    area-Infrastructure
  • Use ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull in more places #105380
    area-Meta
  • [ILASM] Added `/DET` flag for deterministic compilations #85344
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • Move GenTreeVecCon and GenTreeMskCon under the respective FEATURE_* defines #104932
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-25
entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] add some steps for wasi linux x64 #2605
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • Added TypeSpec hierarchy to swift-bindings #2636
    area-SwiftBindings

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SDK 8.0.304 references unpublished version of .NET 6 #42379
  • CVE-2024- #42378
  • Investigate telemetry improvements around how users use workloads #42372
  • Provide CLI commands for investigating the contents and available workload set versions #42367
  • [NETSDKE2E]With 8.0.400 SDK zip installed, Warning: "Workload garbage collection failed with error: Workload version 8.0.400-baseline.24372.6 was not found.." happens when installing maui workload. #42358
  • With .NET 8 SDK installed, Warning "Workload garbage collection failed with error: Workload version 8.0.400-baseline.24372.6 was not found.." displayed when installing Maui workload in CLI. #42357

Closed

  • dotnet tool for deadlock analysis #42348
  • `dotnet list package --outdated` should consider suggested alternatives for deprecated packages #42361

PullRequests

Created

  • Add -pack support for the build CLI so that the zips/msi/packages aren't built by default #42384
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Skip flaky test #42382
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add false positive license scan to exclusions list #42380
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable package source mapping for workload * commands #42373
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Update aspire manifest to 8.1.0 #42364
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Avoid "missing toolset" error in design-time builds #42360
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview7] Re-Bootstrap Source Build to .NET 9.0.100-preview.7.24373.1 #42371
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, 9.0.1xx
  • Utilize build script args to specify target rid #42293
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Switch to build.ubuntu.2204.amd64 image for VMR linux builds #42345
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Enable tab-completion for nuget package versions #42349
    Area-NuGet, Area-CLI, cli-ux
  • [8.0.1xx] No .deps.json for net472 Container task #42317
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-Containers, 8.0.9
  • Enabled NativeAOT for Arm in SourceBuild/content/repo-projects/sdk.proj #42351
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Disable BundleNativeAotCompiler for riscv64 architecture #42158
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-25
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: `params in` parameters #8301

PullRequests

  • Fix notes #8311

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • LibraryImport causes CS8795 #74562
  • Roslyn Scripting APIs for Blazor WebAssembly #74555

Closed

  • How to prevent visual studio from inserting <see langword=""/> in comments #74417
  • Collection expressions apply to types implementing IEnumerable<T> and containing an Add(X) method but no implicit conversion between X and T #74543
  • new() with Nullable<DateTime> type #74556
  • Keep ref struct interfaces behind preview flag #73923
    17.12
  • Saving an AdditionalFiles document in Balanced mode fails to trigger source generator #74395
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35124.136 #74546
  • Debug assert triggered for interpolated string convserion #74427
    17.13

PullRequests

Created

  • Rename Suggestions: Fix getting of the context string, gracefully handle errors #74564
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Remove a closure allocation from WrappedNavigationBarItem.ctor #74563
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Eliminate contentChanged parameter #74561
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Cherry-pick #74507 #74560
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • DocumentState constructors refactoring #74559
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid optimizing away ref array access #74553
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Expose inlay hints to Razor cohosting #74548
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Move code to code style layer #74547
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Don't bring up completion when deleting in an xml doc comment's text #74558
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Instance extensions: prevent user's code from changing value of receiver when it has reference type and is passed by reference. #74508
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Update SystemTextJsonVersion to 8.0.4 #74489
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Move 'generate default constructor' code fix to shared layer. #74557
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Don't try and add the result diagnostics if they are default or empty #74507
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to main #74540
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge changes from a single DidChange notification #74268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Feedback from 'source gen save' pr #74554
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Set FlagNetStandard1XDependencies=true #74549
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Move IDS_FeatureRefStructInterfaces to C# 13 #74551
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces, Next
  • Rerun generators when an additional file is saved. #74542
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Move more code down to shared layer #74539
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove assembly loading light-up from scripting #74409
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Include InterpolatedString conversions in standard implicit conversion from expression assert #74529
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Do not parse methods with accessibility modifiers as local functions (alt) #74495
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid assert in emit layer when intercepted call implicitly captures receiver to temp #74509
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Make it possible to build/run tests on linux-arm64 #74536
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Increase driver cache size #74431
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • With project info #74289
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Extension type erasure #74313
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • [C#] Make interpolated strings including string or char constants as optimized as `+` operator (for string type) #72308
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Do not mark 2 first `int` parameters of an interpolated string handler constructor as unused #74064
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Report fading locations as part of the main diagnostic #74541
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • EnC: Implement support for System.Threading.Lock #74526
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lock Type
  • Address issues with VSIX item publishing projects and FUTDC #74470
    Area-Interactive, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improve the dev experience when a user doesn't apply an interactive render mode to a component that requires interactivity #57009
  • Bring back the old Blazor Templates #57008
  • Angular SPA application with SSR rendering #57004
  • Static file "static" configuration #57002
  • Perf improvement: json, plaintext, plaintext #56998
  • New .Net 8.0 with Angular - Cannot Run In IIS Express even after adding Authentication Negotiate, etc #56996
  • Routes component is not found in assembly when render mode is set to InteractiveAuto #57007
  • [9.0-preview7] OpenAPI schemas are not stable between generations #56990
  • @microsoft/signalr update from 8.0.0 to 8.0.7 webpack_require issue - angular 16 with module federation #56989
  • Perf improvement: plaintext, plainTextEmptyFilter #56987
  • Negotiate H2C on a Kestrel endpoint that supports HTTP/1.1 and HTTP/2 #56984

Closed

  • Perf regression: json, json #56963
  • VS-CODE HTTP launch configuration trusted certificate required #56853
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi How to setup versioning in .net9 using Microsoft OpenApi with minimal-api #56994
  • Keyed services fail to dependency inject into middleware #54500
    9.0-rc1
  • Slowness on the Clint End | Memory spike in the Chrome browser #52557
  • SignalR OnDisconnect not called when client re-connects #53488
  • Cannot use AddJwtBearer with alternate scheme name #56834
  • IMemoryCache duplicating records(from enum key) in blazor wasm #56826
  • Blazor hybrid navigation failed #56838

PullRequests

Created

  • Make dev-certs import consistent with kestrel #57014
    area-networking
  • Main #57012
    area-commandlinetools

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • App name with underscore won't deploy; misleading error message "project needs to be deployed ..." #23839
  • Memory Leaking and buggy Editor #23838
  • .NET 8 MAUI Android - Storage.Preferences returns default value when executed whilst the application isn't running #23837
  • Unstable order of FlyoutItems with conditional visibility #23834
  • Accessing Deployment Files #23833
  • Some HEIC photos is upside down after using PlatformImage.Resize #23832
  • Pasting long text into the Editor not possible on iOS #23831
  • [iOS] "Could not find a part of the path" Firebase CloudMessaging #23829
  • [Android] Loading a large size image throws Java.Lang.RuntimeException #23828
  • Crash - Android condition `xref_count == xref_index' not met, function:processing_build_callback_data #23827
  • CarouselView leaks memory when having 5 items or more #23825
  • [MAUI] I1 - Vertical Grid for Single Span Layout_Scrolling to the bottom of the page and a blank area appears. #23823
  • Unable to add different resolution images for platform specific in .net MAUI while migration #23822

Closed

  • XCode 16 support #23817

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix android image source switch through skip invalidation #23830
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Handle non-seekable streams in `PlatformImage.FromStream` (take 2) #23824
    community ✨

Merged

  • [msbuild] Fix BundleResource defaults for iOS and MacCatalyst #23835
  • [release/8.0.1xx-sr7] [msbuild] Fix BundleResource defaults for iOS and MacCatalyst #23836
  • Add HandlerProperties.DisconnectPolicy for controlling when DisconnectHandler is called #23738
  • Bump previous MAUI version to current release version #23818
  • Use DialogFragment for Android modals #22869
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-dialogalert

Updated

  • Make IWindow.Content nullable #23785
  • [net9.0] Update preview7 packages #23809
    9.0-preview7
  • Fire UpdateValue after all propertychange events #23746
  • Add embedding sample and code #23642
  • Added ProcessTerminated event to WebView #20059
    t/enhancement ☀️, area-controls-webview
  • HybridWebView: Invoke JS methods from .NET #23769
    area-controls-hybridwebview
  • Make `MeasureInvalidated` event work correctly #23052
    community ✨, area-controls-general
  • [iOS] CollectionView - Use compositional layouts #23758
  • Fix Android ImageView flickering between images and drawable disappearing when shell section is removed from FragmentManager #23313
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-image
  • Generate the Android 7 round app icon #23276
    area-single-project
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #23786
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
